overview:
Paul has over 15 years of online marketing experience and is currently working as an online strategy consultant.

Prior to his consulting work Paul worked for 11 years at United Online where he was Vice President of Customer Acquisition for online brands including; NetZero, Classmates.com, Juno and My Points, acquiring over 60 million customers. He has also worked in an executive marketing capacity for Guitar Center corporate and the Los Angeles Times.
